_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

How a person is dark and bound for darkn: Poor, with little to eat or drink
Don't get to have basic necessities and do bad things by way of body, speech, and mind
Reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell
How a person is dark and bound for light: Poor, with little to eat or drink
Don't get to have basic necessities but do good things by way of body, speech, and mind
Reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm
How a person is light and bound for dark: Rich, affluent, and wealthy, with lots of gold and silver, lots of property and assets, and lots of money and grain
Attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty
Get to have basic necessities but do bad things by way of body, speech, and mind
Reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell
How a person is light and bound for ligh: Rich, affluent, and wealthy, with lots of gold and silver, lots of property and assets, and lots of money and grain
Attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty
Get to have basic necessities and do good things by way of body, speech, and mind
Reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm
Characteristics of people who fall into: Miserly, with bad intentions, they lack regard, they have wrong view
Abuse and insult ascetics and brahmins and other renunciates
Prevent others from giving food to beggars
Characteristics of people who go to the: Poor, but faithful and not stingy
Give with best of intentions, that peaceful-hearted person
Rise for and bow to ascetics and brahmins and other renunciates
Don't prevent others from giving food to beggars
